debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Winter Ban on Evictions) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make emergency provision to defer the termination dates of certain tenancies that fall, or would fall, during the period beginning on the day after the date of the passing of this Act and ending on 1 July 2026 in order to mitigate the risk that persons whose tenancies would otherwise be terminated during that period would be unable to obtain alternative accommodation; to make such provision on a phased basis to enable tenancies affected to be terminated over a period of time to assist in managing demands on housing services as a result of such deferred termination; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú éigeandála maidir le dátaí foirceanta tionóntachtaí áirithe a iarchur, ar dátaí iad, nó ar dhátaí iad, le linn na tréimhse dar tosach an lá tar éis dháta rite an Achta seo agus dar críoch an 1 Iúil 2026, d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar an mbaol nach mbeadh daoine a bhfoirceannfaí a dtionóntachtaí le linn na tréimhse sin murach sin in ann cóiríocht ionadúil a fháil; do dhéanamh an tsocraithe sin ar bhonn céimnithe chun a chumasú tionóntachtaí dá ndéanfar difear a fhoirceannadh thar thréimhse ama chun cabhrú le héilimh ar sheirbhísí tithíochta de thoradh foirceannadh iarchurtha den sórt sin a bhainistiú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Winter Ban on Evictions) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Cosc ar Dhíshealbhuithe sa Gheimhreadh), 2025

debates.showAs: Water Services (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013 to give the Commission for the Regulation of Utilities (CRU) the legislative remit to develop a code of practice for water service outages and to amend the Water Services Act 2014 to establish a dispute resolution mechanism for customer complaints regarding service interruptions and outages.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Sheirbhísí Uisce (Uimh. 2), 2013 chun go dtabharfar don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais (CRF) an sainchúram reachtach chun cód cleachtais le haghaidh éarthaí seirbhíse uisce a fhorbairt, agus do leasú an Achta um Sheirbhísí Uisce, 2014 chun sásra um réiteach díospóidí a bhunú le haghaidh gearáin ó chustaiméirí i ndáil le hidirbhristeacha sa tseirbhís agus éarthaí seirbhíse.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Sheirbhísí Uisce (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Water Services (Repeal of Water Charges) Bill 2025: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Water Services (Repeal of Water Charges) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Water Services (Repeal of Water Charges) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to repeal the provision in the Water Services Act 2017 allowing Uisce Éireann to introduce a customer charge for use of water in excess of the specified threshold amount.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’aisghairm na forála san Acht um Sheirbhísí Uisce, 2017 lena gceadaítear d’Uisce Éireann muirear custaiméara a thabhairt isteach as uisce atá de bhreis ar an méid tairsí sonraithe a úsáid.
bill.shortTitleEn: Water Services (Repeal of Water Charges) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Sheirbhísí Uisce (Muirir Uisce a Aisghairm), 2025

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Illegal Evictions) (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the creation of an offence of the forcible ending of a tenancy; to provide for a power to award exemplary damages where an illegal eviction has been found to have occurred; to provide for data exchange between Board and Property Services Regulatory Authority and the Revenue Commissioners in order to establish the identity of landlord of a particular dwelling; for those purposes to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004; and to provide for related matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion a chruthú arb éard é deireadh a chur, le forneart, le tionóntacht; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cumhacht chun damáistí eiseamláireacha a dhámhachtain i gcás go bhfionnfar gur tharla díshealbhú neamhdhleathach; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le malartú sonraí idir an Bord agus an tÚdarás Rialála Seirbhísí Maoine agus na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim d’fhonn céannacht tiarna talún teaghaise ar leith a fháil amach; chun na gcríoch sin, do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Díshealbhuithe Neamhdhleathacha) (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Sex for Rent) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make it an offence for a landlord to seek sex in lieu of rent or to advertise to seek sex in lieu of rent and for that purpose to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh cion de thiarna talún do lorg gnéis in ionad cíosa nó do dhéanamh fógraíochta chun gnéas a lorg in ionad cíosa agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú) (Gnéas i gcomhair Cíosa), 2024

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Deferment of Termination Dates of Certain Tenancies) (No. 2) Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Deferment of Termination Dates of Certain Tenancies) (No. 2) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Deferment of Termination Dates of Certain Tenancies) (No. 2) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make emergency provision to defer the termination dates of certain tenancies that fall, or would fall, during the period beginning on the day after the date of the passing of this Act and ending on 31 March 2024 in order to mitigate the risk that persons whose tenancies would otherwise be terminated during that period would be unable to obtain alternative accommodation; to make such provision on a phased basis to enable tenancies affected to be terminated over a period of time to assist in managing demands on housing services as a result of such deferred termination; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú éigeandála maidir le dátaí foirceanta tionóntachtaí áirithe a iarchur, ar dátaí iad, nó ar dhátaí iad, le linn na tréimhse dar tosach an lá tar éis dháta rite an Achta seo agus dar críoch an 31 Márta 2024, d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar an mbaol nach mbeadh daoine a bhfoirceannfaí a dtionóntachtaí le linn na tréimhse sin murach sin in ann cóiríocht ionadúil a fháil; do dhéanamh an tsocraithe sin ar bhonn céimnithe chun a chumasú tionóntachtaí dá ndéanfar difear a fhoirceannadh thar thréimhse ama chun cabhrú le héilimh ar sheirbhísí tithíochta de thoradh foirceannadh iarchurtha den sórt sin a bhainistiú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Deferment of Termination Dates of Certain Tenancies) (No. 2) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Dátaí Foirceanta Tionóntachtaí Áirithe a Iarchur) (Uimh. 2), 2023

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Provision of Public Housing) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 and to repeal section 97(3)(b).
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 agus d’aisghairm alt 97(3)(b).
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Provision of Public Housing) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Tithíocht Phoiblí a Sholáthar), 2023

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Deferment of Termination Dates of Certain Tenancies) Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Deferment of Termination Dates of Certain Tenancies) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make emergency provision to defer the termination dates of certain tenancies that fall, or would fall, during the period beginning on the day after the date of the passing of this Act and ending on 31 January 2024 in order to mitigate the risk that persons whose tenancies would otherwise be terminated during that period would be unable to obtain alternative accommodation; to make such provision on a phased basis to enable tenancies affected to be terminated over a period of time to assist in managing demands on housing services as a result of such deferred termination; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú éigeandála maidir le dátaí foirceanta tionóntachtaí áirithe a iarchur, ar dátaí iad, nó ar dhátaí iad le linn na tréimhse dar tosach an lá tar éis dháta rite an Achta seo agus dar críoch an 31 Eanáir 2024, d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar an mbaol nach mbeadh daoine a bhfoirceannfaí a dtionóntachtaí le linn na tréimhse sin murach sin in ann cóiríocht ionadúil a fháil; do dhéanamh an tsocraithe sin ar bhonn céimnithe chun a chumasú tionóntachtaí dá ndéanfar difear a fhoirceannadh thar thréimhse ama chun cabhrú le héilimh ar sheirbhísí tithíochta de thoradh foirceannadh iarchurtha den sórt sin a bhainistiú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Deferment of Termination Dates of Certain Tenancies) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Dátaí Foirceanta Tionóntachtaí Áirithe a Iarchur), 2023

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend Planning and Development Regulations, 2001 (S.I. No. 600 of 2001) to provide for exemptions from planning permission for certain categories of public art murals where such work has artistic or cultural merit, has the permission of the owner of the building or structure on which it is displayed, is not a commercial advertisement and does not conflict with the Equal Status Acts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na Rialachán um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2001 (I.R. Uimh. 600 de 2001) chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le díolúintí ó chead pleanála le haghaidh earnálacha áirithe múrphictiúr ealaíne poiblí i gcás go mbeidh fiúntas ealaíne nó cultúir sa saothar sin, go mbeidh cead tugtha ina leith ag úinéir an fhoirgnimh nó an déanmhais ar a mbeidh sé á chur ar taispeáint agus nach fógrán tráchtála é ná nach mbeidh sé ar neamhréir leis na hAchtanna um Stádas Comhionann.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Múrphictiúir Ealaíne Poiblí (Forbairt Dhíolmhaithe), 2023

debates.showAs: Short-term Lettings Enforcement Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Short-term Lettings Enforcement Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend section 38 of the Planning and Development Act 2000 (as amended) to require estate agents and online platforms to only advertise properties that are compliant with the Planning and Development Act 2000 (Exempted Development) (No. 2) Regulations 2019.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú alt 38 den Acht um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 (arna leasú) chun a cheangal ar ghníomhairí eastáit agus ar ardáin ar líne gan ach maoine a chomhlíonann na Rialacháin fán Acht um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 (Forbairt Dhíolmhaithe) (Uimh. 2), 2019 a fhógairt.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ligin Ghearrthéarma a Fhorfheidhmiú, 2022

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) (Breach of Building Regulations) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Amendment) (Breach of Building Regulations) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) (Sárú ar Rialacháin Foirgníochta), 2022

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Extension of Notice Periods) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Extension of Notice Periods) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled Act to provide for the automatic extension of notice periods with respect to residential tenancies where a tenant is certified as at risk of homelessness and for that purpose to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhsí fógra a fhadú go huathoibríoch maidir le tionóntachtaí cónaithe i gcás go ndeimhnítear go bhfuil tionónta i mbaol na heaspa dídine agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Extension of Notice Periods) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú) (Tréimhsí Fógra a Fhadú), 2021

debates.showAs: Health (Inspection of Emergency Homeless Accommodation and Asylum Seekers Accommodation) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable the Health Information and Quality Authority to inspect certain emergency homeless residential accommodation in respect of which assistance has been or is being given under section 10 of the Housing Act 1988 by a local authority within the meaning of the Local Government Act 2001, to enable the Health Information and Quality Authority to inspect reception centres and accommodation centres provided for asylum seekers to which the European Communities (Reception Conditions) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 230 of 2018) relate, and for those purposes to amend the Health Act 2007 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chumasú don Údarás um Fhaisnéis agus Cáilíocht Sláinte iniúchadh a dhéanamh ar chóiríocht chónaithe éigeandála áirithe do dhaoine gan dídean arb ina leith a thug, nó a thugann, údarás áitiúil de réir bhrí an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2001 cúnamh faoi alt 10 d’Acht na dTithe, 1988, dá chumasú don Údarás um Fhaisnéis agus Cáilíocht Sláinte iniúchadh a dhéanamh ar ionaid ghlactha agus ionaid chóiríochta a sholáthraítear d’iarratasóirí ar thearmann agus lena mbaineann Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Coinníollacha Glactha), 2018 (I.R. Uimh. 230 de 2018), agus, chun na gcríoch sin, do leasú an Achta Sláinte, 2007 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Inspection of Emergency Homeless Accommodation and Asylum Seekers Accommodation) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Iniúchadh ar Chóiríocht Éigeandála do Dhaoine gan Dídean agus ar Chóiríocht d’Iarratasóirí ar Thearmann), 2021

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) (20 per cent Provision of Social and Affordable Housing) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Planning and Development (Amendment) (20 per cent Provision of Social and Affordable Housing) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 to delete the sunset clause which affords an exemption to developers who secure planning permission before 2026 to provide 20 per cent of the relevant land or houses for social and affordable housing.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 chun an clásal éagtha a scriosadh lena dtugtar díolúine d’fhorbróirí, a fhaigheann cead pleanála roimh 2026, maidir le 20 faoin gcéad den talamh nó de na tithe is iomchuí a sholáthar le haghaidh tithíocht shóisialta agus inacmhainne.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Amendment) (20 per cent Provision of Social and Affordable Housing) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) (Soláthar 20 faoin gcéad maidir le Tithíocht Shóisialta agus Inacmhainne), 2021

debates.showAs: Ban on Rent Increases Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Ban on Rent Increases Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 (as amended) to provide for a prohibition on rent increases for all existing and new tenancies for three years.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 (arna leasú) chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le toirmeasc ar arduithe cíosa do gach tionóntacht, idir láithreach agus nua, ar feadh trí bliana.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosc ar Arduithe Cíosa, 2021

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Student Rents and Other Protections) (Covid-19) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Student Rents and Other Protections) (Covid-19) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision in relation to certain tenants’ obligations to pay rent in respect of dwellings used for accommodation during academic term times, to make provision in relation to the maximum period of notice required by such tenants to terminate a tenancy, to oblige certain landlords to refund relevant payments in certain circumstances relating to Covid-19, for those purposes to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil le hoibleagáidí de chuid tionóntaí áirithe cíos a íoc i leith teaghaisí a úsáidtear le haghaidh cóiríochta le linn amanna an téarma acadúil, do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil leis an tréimhse fógra uasta a cheanglaíonn tionóntaí den sórt sin a thabhairt chun tionóntacht a fhoirceannadh, do chur oibleagáid ar thiarnaí talún áirithe íocaíochtaí iomchuí a aisíoc in imthosca áirithe a bhaineann le Covid-19, chun na gcríoch sin do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Student Rents and Other Protections) (Covid-19) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Cíosanna agus Cosaintí Eile do Mhic Léinn) (Covid-19), 2021

debates.showAs: Housing (Standards for Rented Houses) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1992 so the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage may introduce regulations for landlords to prove their compliance with minimum standards and fire safety standards before a property can be rented.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 1992 ionas go bhféadfaidh an tAire Tithíochta, Rialtais Áitiúil agus Oidhreachta rialacháin a thabhairt isteach chun go gcruthóidh tiarnaí talún go gcomhlíonann siad caighdeáin íosta agus caighdeáin um shábháilteacht ó dhóiteán sular féidir maoin a ligean ar cíos.
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na dTithe (Caighdeáin le haghaidh Tithe ar Cíos), 2020

debates.showAs: Homeless Prevention Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Homeless Prevention Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn:
Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing Act 1988 to provide a legal definition of persons at risk of	
homelessness and to give the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage and local authorities the power to provide such persons with supports to prevent them from becoming homeless.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na dTithe, 1988 chun míniú dlíthiúil ar dhaoine atá i mbaol na heaspa dídine a sholáthar agus chun an chumhacht a thabhairt don Aire Tithíochta, Rialtais Áitiúil agus Oidhreachta agus d’údaráis áitiúla tacaí a sholáthar do na daoine sin chun nach dtiocfaidh siad chun bheith gan dídean.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Easpa Dídine a Chosc, 2020

debates.showAs: Latent Defects Redress Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a Latent Defects Redress Board, the functions of which shall be,	 inter alia, to provide resolution to ordinary owners who purchased homes in good faith, in order that such owners have an opportunity to seek mediation or adjudication in relation to non-compliance with building regulations.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú Bord um Shásamh i leith Lochtanna Neamhfhollasa arb iad na feidhmeanna a bheidh aige, inter alia, réiteach a sholáthar do ghnáthúinéirí a cheannaigh teaghaisí de mheon macánta, ionas go mbeidh deis ag úinéirí den sórt sin idirghabháil nó breithniú a lorg i ndáil le neamhchomhlíonadh rialachán foirgníochta.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shásamh i leith Lochtanna Neamhfhollasa, 2020

debates.showAs: Thirty-ninth Amendment of the Constitution (Right to a Home) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-ninth Amendment of the Constitution (Right to a Home) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Naoú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (An Ceart chun Teaghaise), 2020

debates.showAs: Ministerial Power (Repeal) (Ban Co-Living and Build to Rent) Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Ministerial Power (Repeal) (Ban Co-Living and Build to Rent) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ministerial Power (Repeal) (Ban Co-Living and Build to Rent) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 and to repeal the Build to Rent and Shared Accommodation sections of the following guidelines issued to planning authorities thereafter, namely Sustainable Urban Housing: Design Standards for New Apartments, March 2018.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 agus d’aisghairm na n-alt maidir le Tógáil le Ligean ar Cíos agus le Cónaí Comhroinnte de na treoirlínte seo a leanas arna n-eisiúint chuig údaráis phleanála dá éis sin, eadhon, Tithíocht Uirbeach Inchothaithe: Caighdeáin Dearaidh d’Árasáin Nua, Márta 2018.
bill.shortTitleEn: Ministerial Power (Repeal) (Ban Co-Living and Build to Rent) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chumhacht Aireachta (Aisghairm) (Cosc ar Chónaí Comhroinnte agus ar Thógáil le Ligean ar Cíos), 2020

debates.showAs: Ban on Rent Increases Bill 2020: First Stage
Ban on Rent Increases Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Ban on Rent Increases Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ban on Rent Increases Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 (as amended) to provide for a prohibition on rent increases for all existing and new tenancies for three years.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 (arna leasú) chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le toirmeasc ar mhéaduithe cíosa do gach tionóntacht, idir láithreach agus nua, ar feadh trí bliana.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosc ar Mhéaduithe Cíosa, 2020

debates.showAs: Rent Freeze (Fair Rent) Bill 2019: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Rent Freeze (Fair Rent) Bill 2019: Second Stage [Private Members]
Rent Freeze (Fair Rent) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 (as amended) to provide for a rent freeze for all existing and new tenancies.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 (arna leasú) chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le calcadh cíosa do gach tionóntacht, idir láithreach agus nua.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chalcadh Cíosa (Cóirchíos), 2019

debates.showAs: Latent Defects Redress Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a Latent Defects Redress Board, the functions of which shall be, inter alia, to provide resolution to ordinary owners who purchased homes in good faith, in order that such owners have an opportunity to seek mediation or adjudication in relation to non-compliance with building regulations.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú Bord um Shásamh i leith Lochtanna Neamhfhollais arb iad a fheidhmeanna, inter alia, réiteach a sholáthar do ghnáthúinéirí a cheannaigh teaghaisí de mheon macánta, ionas go mbeidh deis ag úinéirí den sórt sin idirghabháil nó breithniú a lorg i ndáil le neamhchomhlíonadh rialachán foirgníochta.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shásamh i leith Lochtanna Neamhfhollais, 2019

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Ministerial Power Repeal) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 and to repeal the following guidelines issued to planning authorities thereafter, namely Sustainable Urban Housing: Design Standards for New Apartments, March 2018, and Urban Development and Building Heights, December 2018.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 agus d’aisghairm na dtreoirlínte seo a leanas arna n-eisiúint chuig údaráis phleanála dá éis sin, eadhon, Tithíocht Uirbeach Inbhuanaithe: Caighdeáin Dearaidh d’Árasáin Nua, Márta 2018, agus Forbairt Uirbeach agus Airde Foirgneamh, Nollaig 2018.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Ministerial Power Repeal) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Cumhacht Aireachta a Aisghairm), 2019

debates.showAs: Social Housing (Real Social Housing) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing Acts 1966 to 2009 by providing a definition of social housing and social housing support. The Act makes a distinction between the provision of real social housing, a dwelling owned by the local authority or an approved housing body, and social housing support which can include Housing Assistance Payment, long term leases and Rental Accommodation Scheme tenancies.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Achtanna na dTithe, 1966 go 2009, trí mhíniú a sholáthar ar thithíocht shóisialta agus ar thacaíocht do thithíocht shóisialta. Déantar idirdhealú san Acht idir soláthar fíor-thithíochta sóisialta, teaghais ar úinéireacht ag an údarás áitiúil nó ag comhlacht tithíochta ceadaithe, agus tacaíocht do thithíocht shóisialta a bhféadfaidh a bheith ar áireamh inti Íocaíocht Cúnaimh Tithíochta, léasanna fadtéarma agus tionóntachtaí faoin Scéim Cóiríochta ar Cíos.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thithíocht Shóisialta (Fíor-Thithíocht Shóisialta), 2019

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Prevention of Family Homelessness) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Prevention of Family Homelessness) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Prevention of Family Homelessness) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and Residential Tenancies Act 2016 to give greater protection to households renting from buy-to-let landlords. Under the Act it would no longer be legal to evict tenants in buy-to-let properties on the grounds that the property is to be sold. A sale could take place however with the current tenant and any remaining portion of the tenancy agreement still in place.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun cosaint níos fearr a thabhairt do líonta tí a bhfuil maoin ar cíos acu ó thiarnaí talún 'ceannach lena ligean'. Faoin Acht, ní bheadh sé dleathach a thuilleadh tionóntaí i maoine 'ceannach lena ligean' a dhíshealbhú ar na forais go bhfuil an mhaoin le díol. D'fhéadfaí an mhaoin a dhíol, áfach, agus an tionónta reatha agus aon chuid den chomhaontú tionóntachta a bheidh fágtha fós in situ.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Prevention of Family Homelessness) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Easpa Dídine Teaghlaigh a Chosc), 2018

debates.showAs: Property Services (Regulation) (Amendment) (Management Company Regulation) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Property Services (Regulation) (Amendment) (Management Company Regulation) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Property Services (Regulation) (Amendment) Act 2011 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Sheirbhísí Maoine (Rialáil) (Leasú), 2011 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Sheirbhísí Maoine (Rialáil) (Leasú) (Cuideachtaí Bainistíochta a Rialáil), 2018

debates.showAs: Emergency Homeless Accommodation and Direct Provision Independent Inspection Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to amend the Health Act 2007 to grant the Health Information and Quality Authority (HIQA) the power to inspect all emergency homeless accommodation funded by the Department of Housing, Planning and Community and Local Government. The Act also grants HIQA the power to inspect direct provision centres funded by the Reception and Integration Agency (RIA) of the Department of Justice and Equality.*
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte, 2007 chun an chumhacht a thabhairt don Údarás um Fhaisnéis agus Cáilíocht Sláinte iniúchadh a dhéanamh ar an gcóiríocht éigeandála uile do dhaoine gan dídean arna maoiniú ag an Roinn Tithíochta, Pleanála, Pobail agus Rialtais Áitiúil. Leis an Acht, tugtar an chumhacht freisin don Údarás um Fhaisnéis agus Cáilíocht Sláinte iniúchadh a dhéanamh ar ionaid soláthair dhírigh arna maoiniú ag an nGníomhaireacht um Ghlacadh agus Lánpháirtiú sa Roinn Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais.
bill.shortTitleEn: Emergency Homeless Accommodation and Direct Provision Independent Inspection Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Iniúchadh Neamhspleách ar Chóiríocht Éigeandála do Dhaoine gan Dídean agus ar Sholáthar Díreach, 2018

debates.showAs: Homeless Prevention Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing Act 1988 to provide a legal definition of persons at risk of homelessness and to give the Minister for Housing, Planning and Local Government and local authorities the power to provide suchs persons with supports to prevent them from becoming homeless.
bill.longTitleGa:
Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na dTithe, 1988 chun míniú dlíthiúil 
ar dhaoine atá i mbaol na heaspa dídine a sholáthar agus chun an chumhacht 
a thabhairt don Aire Tithíochta, Pleanála agus Rialtais Áitiúil agus d 
'údaráis áitiúla tacaí a sholáthar do na daoine sin chun nach dtiocfaidh 
siad chun bheith gan dídean.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Easpa Dídine a Chosc, 2018

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Student Rents, Rights and Protections) Bill 2018: Leave to Withdraw [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Student rents, rights and protections) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Student Rents, Rights and Protections) Bill 2018: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Student Rents, Rights and Protections) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and the Planning and Development (Housing) and Residential Tenancies Act 2016 to give students living in student specific accommodation under license the full protections of the Residential Tenancies Acts, including access to the Residential Tenancies Board and inclusion in the rent pressure zones.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Tithíocht) agus um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2016 d'fhonn cosaintí iomlána na nAchtanna um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe a thabhairt do mhic léinn a bhfuil cónaí orthu, faoi cheadúnas, i gcóiríocht atá go sonrach do mhic léinn, lena n-áirítear rochtain ar an mBord um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe agus a bheith ar áireamh sna criosanna brú cíosa.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Student rents, rights and protections) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Cíosanna, cearta agus cosaintí do mhic léinn), 2018

debates.showAs: Secure Rents and Tenancies Bill 2016: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Secure Rents and Tenancies Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Secure Rents and Tenancies Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 to provide for rent certainty in the private rental market by linking changes in rent arising from a rent review to the Consumer Price Index and to provide for greater security of tenure by making Part 4 tenancies of indefinite duration and removing sale of property as grounds for terminating a tenancy
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cinnteacht chíosa sa mhargadh cíosa príobháideach trí athruithe ar chíos a eascróidh as athbhreithniú cíosa a nascadh leis an Treoir-Uimhir Praghsanna do Thomhaltóirí agus chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le ráthaíocht tionachta níos mó trí thionóntachtaí ré éiginnte a dhéanamh de thionóntachtaí faoi Chuid 4 agus trí dhíol maoine a bhaint de na forais le tionóntacht a fhoirceannadh
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chíosanna agus Tionóntachtaí Ráthaithe, 2016

amendmentList.showAs: Cream List [Seanad amendments to Dáil Bill]

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 by the deletion of section 28(1C), and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 trí alt 28(1C) a scriosadh, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2016

debates.showAs: Social Housing Bill 2016: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Social Housing Bill 2016: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Social Housing Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Social Housing Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 to provide for an increased percentage of social and affordable housing in private residential developments and in strategic development zones
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le céatadán méadaithe de thithíocht shóisialta agus incheannaithe i bhforbairtí cónaithe príobháideacha agus i gcriosanna forbartha straitéisí
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thithíocht Shóisialta, 2016
